documents.document: Expectations. They say expect the unexpected. Which we normally don’t. Because we don’t know what is unexpected. We expect what we want, to happen. We expect our friends to be there. And we expect our really close friends to be there forever. We think that once we make each other promises – promises that are […]

If you can keep a secret, I’ll tell you one thing. There’s a dream that I’ve knit, A place where trees-dance and sing. The sun above your head, Shines the light into your soul. Its rays tingle down the birth bed, And the salad days hit the roll. There’s a stream that flows down […]

Superman, Batman, Ironman, Spiderman, etc are the unreal fictional heroes. Presidents, prime ministers, policemen, detectives, etc are the known and everyday heroes. Mothers, fathers, siblings, friends and teachers are the social heroes. But there are people you come across everyday – who are unknown to you – who play no roles in your lives […]

I am not heard enough, not ofttimes, I am louder than the action and the word itself. No, I am not found in those melodious jingles and rhymes, I may not be strong but I speak for myself. Yes, you see through me – every now and then, I enunciate best for lost hope […]

When you’re friends with people who are way different from you, you tend to make adjustments just so you get along peacefully with that person no matter what the differences are. But when you’re best friends with such people? It, sometimes, gets just worse. Considering how that person is your best friend – you expect him/her […]

A few days back I met with a girl in a local train, who comes from a small city and has dreams bigger than her size. Tell you what – I bet she is thinking about what more she wants to achieve, as I write. She was a funny girl, with fairy dust all around […]

“I want to live, mother.” Is what Nirbhaya had said when she was on her death bed. Little did she know that her strength – had become the entire World’s strength, her hopes – had become the entire World’s hopes and her voice – had become the entire World’s voice. Nirbhaya, (pseudonym given to the […]

Perfection, is what most of us long for. Even the most imperfect of us have a strange craving, lust, for perfection. Greed – is what it is. The greed to feel, live, give, get and be better. The term ‘satisfaction’ is merely a word that has found its meaning only in the dictionaries. But […]

“Close your eyes, little one, Dream a dream, up the sun. Don’t twitch your eyes, let it go, Bring life to what you see, seek the flow.” I opened my eyes, to see you smile, Ma, you make the world seem so fragile. You didn’t forget to get my shield against the cold.I hold […]

12 years. I spent 12 years of my life in a small city in Madhya Pradesh, called Gwalior. It’s the place where I spent my entire childhood, where the base, of what I am now, was made and also the place that I used to call home. Home. I live in Mumbai now, but can […]
